notes:
Lersatio was once a normal person and a citizen of [[Carlin]]. He, his brothers [[Arthei]], [[Marziel]], and [[Boreth]], and Arthei's wife [[Kala]], travelled to [[Yalahar]] in order to find a new home. From that moment on Marziel started keeping a [[Arthei's Descent into Vampirism I (Book)|diary]].
Lersatio is a vain vampire who dreams to see his face in a mirror again, which is why he awakens when you break the mirrors near him. He is the second boss you will encounter during the [[Blood Brothers Quest]]. He spawns with 2 [[Vampire]]s.
You will receive [[The Dust of Lersatio]] when you use a [[Blessed Wooden Stake]] on his dead body.
sounds: The monsters in the mirrors will come eat your dreams.
Your pitiful life has come to an end.
One day I will see my pretty face in a mirror again.
name: Lersatio
behaviour: He fights till death. Uses [[Invisibility]] very often.
strategy: '''Knights:''' the best option is to [[Exori]] or [[Exori Gran]] as much as possible while keeping an eye on your health.  That way you kill all the summons as well so they don't do extra damage.
